sent.orig: Electric guitar, bass guitar, digital tuner and metronome, guitar accessories and pads, miniature.
sent.trans: 电吉他，电贝司，数码调音器和节拍器，吉他配件和部件，小配件。

sent.orig: We manufacture classic guitar, acoustic guitar, electric guitar, electric bass, bags and cases etc.
sent.trans: 公司生产古典吉他、民谣吉他、电吉他、电贝司、琴盒、琴袋等产品。

sent.orig: We provide lessons for guitar, bass guitar, voice, flute.
sent.trans: 吉他，低音吉他，发声法，长笛，小提琴，中提琴。

sent.orig: Well, a classical guitar has nylon strings and its neck is bigger than a steel-string guitar's.
sent.trans: 嗯，古典吉他用尼龙弦而且琴把比钢弦的吉他大。

sent.orig: Acoustic guitar, guitar, ukulele, drum set, violin.
sent.trans: 木吉他，电吉他，优克丽丽，爵士鼓，小提琴。
